title: Regression in `Deref<Target = dyn Fn(T)>`: forcing query with already existing DepNode

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-stable
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from one stable version to another.

body:
The following code works in 1.56.0 but crashes 1.57.0 as well as the most recent nightly — `rustc 1.59.0-nightly (0b42deacc 2021-12-09)`. ```rust struct Struct(T); impl std::ops::Deref for Struct { type Target = dyn Fn(T); fn deref(&self) -> &Self::Target { unimplemented!() } } fn main() { let f = Struct(Default::default()); f(0); f(0); } ``` ```console $ cargo check thread 'rustc' panicked at 'forcing query with already existing `DepNode` - query-key: Binder(std::ops::FnOnce<({integer},)>, []) - dep-node: own_existential_vtable_entries(5494fdf0afa3bf46-73ce537069178b52)', /rustc/0b42deaccc2cbe17a68067aa5fdb76104369e1fd/compiler/rustc_query_system/src/dep_graph/graph.rs:236:9 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.59.0-nightly (0b42deacc 2021-12-09) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [own_existential_vtable_entries] finding all existential vtable entries for trait core::ops::function::FnOnce #1 [evaluate_obligation] evaluating trait selection obligation `(dyn core::ops::function::Fn(^2_0) + 'static): core::ops::function::Fn<(^1_1,)>` end of query stack ```
Backtrace

own_existential_vtable_entries(5494fdf0afa3bf46-73ce537069178b52)', /rustc/0b42deaccc2cbe17a68067aa5fdb76104369e1fd/compiler/rustc_query_system/src/dep_graph/graph.rs:236:9 stack backtrace: 0:
